name: Roots of Mythstory
description:
The cat and the rabbit are both adventurous explorers who enjoy discovering dangerous and exciting things, as well as searching for lost artifacts. They work together to overcome obstacles in their quest to uncover the mysteries of ancient civilizations.

How to play

Cat

AD = Movement

S = Crouch

SpaceBar = Jump

Rabbit

Arrow left or right = Movement

Arrow up = Jump

Special thanks to

Lord of the Land - Kevin MacLeod
